channel.title: [317] Purgatory - Advanced 317
channel.description:
Welcome to my project thread google! I'm just now starting my first actual server project very soon. The server will be [b]heavily[/b] weighted on a well-based economy and the involvement of all skills and pulls/picks of runescape best current/past features. I will post pictures very soon!
A little bit about me: I'm definitely not the greatest, nor near-greatest developer known or even in our community for that matter. I am taking some programming classes this year in hopes to learn something and apply it on my server here. I do have a decent knowledge on java and computer hardware/software. I'm more of an athletic type but I do make time for rs2 haha. I will probably be the most calm and setback person you'll come to meet. I'm currently a sophomore in high-school.
[b]Server Name:[/b] [I]Purgatory[/I] [B]Server Base:[/B] [I]Project Insanity[/B] - Hopefully we will rewrite somethings such as the event system to make the server more stable and adequate. [B]Server Owner:[/B] [I]thedopekid[/I] (Me)
[CENTER][B]Server Plans[/B][/CENTER]
[ul][*]474 Gameframe [*]602 Items [No torva, pernix, cerimonial, etc.] [*]Old School World [Up to 474 items and prayers] [*]New School World [Up to 602 items and prayers(curses)] [*]Chaotics [*]Few Customs* [*]Duel Arena - [I]Major[/i] focus [*]Fight Pits [*]Castle Wars [*]New Innovative Features - things other servers don't have [*]Clan Chat - 474 Style [*]Clan Controllability** [*]Jad - Very tough - Only the best deserve firecape [*]Moderator, Administrator, and Owner Panels - In Server/Client (Nearly No Commands) [*]More Features To Be Listed [*]Server Lottery***[/ul]
*We will have a few customs such as: PkP Whips, Dragon Kiteshield, and Donator Cape (Not to many that cause the eco to crash) (Also not to overpowered causing unfair pvp) (PkP whips will have specials such as: White Whip - 65% Special: Drains Opponent's Prayer 1.5x faster for 20 seconds)
**Extended clan features such as: While in a combat area, members within your clan will have the 'walk here' left-click option instead of 'attack' so you don't miss-click a clan member.
***Lottery: This lottery will be like no other lottery on any RSPS. Here is how it'll work: Players may buy as many 'entries' as they please(There will be two different lotteries: a Major Jackpot and a Minor Jackpot). Once the lottery pot hits a predefined amount of rsgp, winners will be rewarded automatically. (Ex: Major Entry Fee: 5m Major Jackpot: 250m, 1st 175m, 2nd 50m, 3rd 25m | Minor Entry Fee: 500k Minor Jackpot 25m: 1st 17.5m, 2nd 5m, 3rd 2.5m)
[B][SIZE=4]Media:[/SIZE][/B]
[img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/1.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/2.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/3.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/4.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/5.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/6.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/7.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/8.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/9.png[/img] [img]http://purgatory.net23.net/downloads/images/10.png[/img]
If you are interested in partenering on this project fill in a application: Positions Open: [COLOR="#008000"]Server Programming Assistant[/COLOR] [COLOR="#008000"]Client Programmer[/COLOR] [COLOR="#008000"]Forum Moderator(Must prove maturity)[/COLOR] [COLOR="#008000"]Beta Tester[/COLOR] [code] Name: Position: Experience: Contact Method: Time Zone/Availability: [/code]

item.title: [317] Purgatory - Advanced 317
item.dc:creator: @thedopekid thedopekid
item.description:
@thedopekid wrote:

xmonster:

Good luck hope you don’t find anything, I want to support this

Find anything? ;o

xmonster:

Now right there is a great server, if it’s online I’m so joining

It’ll be online soon, wanna give it some of it’s own unique features to make it my ‘own’ serverish, if ya get the gist.

F A I L S:

I swear I saw this somewhere, I’m going to look into it. If this is not leeched I will be checking this thread for new updates, However if it is leeched, Well then you need to develop your “Own” work. I completely apologize if I look into this and find nothing. As of right now i’m looking forward to this. Good luck.

I have threads posted on other communities. And thanks man! It won’t be leeched, trying my hardest to make it everything but that.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Purgatory - Advanced 317
item.dc:creator: @thedopekid thedopekid
item.description:
@thedopekid wrote:

Welcome to my project thread google! I’m just now starting my first actual server project very soon. The server will be heavily weighted on a well-based economy and the involvement of all skills and pulls/picks of runescape best current/past features. I will post pictures very soon!

A little bit about me: I’m definitely not the greatest, nor near-greatest developer known or even in our community for that matter. I am taking some programming classes this year in hopes to learn something and apply it on my server here. I do have a decent knowledge on java and computer hardware/software. I’m more of an athletic type but I do make time for rs2 haha. I will probably be the most calm and setback person you’ll come to meet. I’m currently a sophomore in high-school.

Server Name: Purgatory
Server Base: [I]Project Insanity[/B] - Hopefully we will rewrite somethings such as the event system to make the server more stable and adequate.
Server Owner: thedopekid (Me)

[CENTER]Server Plans[/CENTER]

[ul][]474 Gameframe
[]602 Items [No torva, pernix, cerimonial, etc.]
[]Old School World [Up to 474 items and prayers]
[]New School World [Up to 602 items and prayers(curses)]
[]Chaotics
[]Few Customs*
[]Duel Arena - Major focus
[]Fight Pits
[]Castle Wars
[]New Innovative Features - things other servers don’t have
[]Clan Chat - 474 Style
[]Clan Controllability**
[]Jad - Very tough - Only the best deserve firecape
[]Moderator, Administrator, and Owner Panels - In Server/Client (Nearly No Commands)
[]More Features To Be Listed
[]Server Lottery***[/ul]

*We will have a few customs such as: PkP Whips, Dragon Kiteshield, and Donator Cape (Not to many that cause the eco to crash) (Also not to overpowered causing unfair pvp) (PkP whips will have specials such as: White Whip - 65% Special: Drains Opponent’s Prayer 1.5x faster for 20 seconds)

**Extended clan features such as: While in a combat area, members within your clan will have the ‘walk here’ left-click option instead of ‘attack’ so you don’t miss-click a clan member.

***Lottery: This lottery will be like no other lottery on any RSPS. Here is how it’ll work: Players may buy as many ‘entries’ as they please(There will be two different lotteries: a Major Jackpot and a Minor Jackpot). Once the lottery pot hits a predefined amount of rsgp, winners will be rewarded automatically. (Ex: Major Entry Fee: 5m Major Jackpot: 250m, 1st 175m, 2nd 50m, 3rd 25m | Minor Entry Fee: 500k Minor Jackpot 25m: 1st 17.5m, 2nd 5m, 3rd 2.5m)
